channel.title: About on Jakub Kuzilek
channel.description: Recent content in About on Jakub Kuzilek

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me I am Prague (CZ) based postdoc researcher focusing on Educational Data Mining and Learning Analytics. I am interested in machine learning, signal processing, and R. Let’s start scrolling and learn more.
I am postdoc researcher at Czech Technical University in Prague. Since completion of my Ph.D. in Biomedical Signal Processing using Blind Source Separation methods I am focusing on Educational Data Mining and Learning Analytics research. This switch was caused by professor Zdenek Zdrahal from Knowledge Media Institute (Open University) who invited me to work with him on Data Mining of student data in project OU Analyse.

item.description: Research Learning Analytics Educational Data mining Explainable AI Machine Learning Projects Year Project Funding source Role 2011 Multimedia support for ECG signal processing education University Development Foundation (CTU) Principal Investigator 2012 Multimedia support for accessible web education University Development Foundation (CTU) Principal Investigator 2010 - 2012 New approaches in acquisition, evaluation and use of biological data University Development Foundation Researcher 2013 - 2016 New approaches in acquisition, evaluation and use of biological data II.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Teaching Learning Analytics (dashboards) Group work seminar on the development of own Learning Analytics Dashboard using Open University Learning Analytics Dataset as underlying data source. Template solution Resources Machine Learning for Education Course focus on getting overall understanding of Machine Learning and its application in Education via external lectures and practical seminars. Resources Mentoring Individual projects Individual research project for one semester. I got a bunch of exciting topics for the project.
